title: Nucleic Acid Prep with MagBeads
author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs a multi-step nucleic acid purification protocol that involves use of the Opentrons Magnetic Module and Opentrons Temperature Module. This protocol is designed for use with 96 samples and designed to pause for user inputs (adding reagents, replacing tipracks, etc). See the Setup section below for more details regarding the placement of reagents and labware.



P50 Single-channel electronic pipette
P300 Multi-channel Pipette
50/300uL Opentrons Tipracks
Opentrons Magnetic Module
Opentrons Temperature Module with Aluminum Block Set
Bio-Rad Hard Shell 96-well PCR plate 200ul #hsp9601
USA Scientific 12-channel reservoir 22ml #1061-8150
Agilent 290ml Reservoir
2mL Tubes (preferably screwcap), for Aluminum Tube Rack



Slot 1: Opentrons Aluminum Tube Rack
    * A1: Hybridization Buffer (HB)
    * B1: Hybridization Buffer + Spike_1 (HB1)
    * C1: Magnetic Beads
Slot 2: 12-Channel Reservoir
    * Column 1: Reaction Buffer Master Mix
    * Column 2: HRP
    * Column 3: Substrate
Slot 3: 290ml Reservoir (loaded with PBS-T)
Slot 4: Opentrons Magnetic Module
Slot 5: 290ml Reservoir (empty, for liquid waste)
Slot 6: 290ml Reservoir (loaded with Wash Buffer)
Slot 7: Opentrons Temperature Module with 96-Well Aluminum Block
Slot 8: 50/300uL Opentrons Tiprack
Slot 9: 50/300uL Opentrons Tiprack
Slot 10: 50/300uL Opentrons Tiprack
Slot 11: 50/300uL Opentrons Tiprack
process:
Input your protocol parameters.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.

Slot 8: [50/300uL Opentrons Tiprack](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-300ul-tips)
